properties.entry: select note_id, fracture, case when note_set = 'train' then 1 else 0 end train from fracture_demo

select f.note_id, code, COUNT(*) from @db.schema@.V_DOCUMENT_ONTOANNO o inner join @db.schema@.document d on d.document_id = o.document_id inner join @db.schema@.fracture_demo f on f.note_id = d."uid" where certainty <> -1 and d.analysis_batch = 'cpe-fracture' group by f.note_id, code
